0.34.text:
Clare: Brain training in any activity that
challenges the brain so this could be

4.58.text:
crossword puzzles, Sudoku puzzles, or
playing custom-made online brain

9.73.text:
training games. The theory behind brain
training is use it or lose it which is

14.84.text:
that the more you challenge your brain
in skills like memory and thinking the

19.50.text:
less likely you are to lose these
abilities as you get older. So there's

23.44.text:
some evidence to suggest that this may
be true but we're still researching

26.77.text:
different brain training packages to
find out whether they work. Online brain

31.42.text:
training is rapidly growing into a
multi-million pound industry but they're

35.19.text:
still not enough research evidence to
show what these brain training packages

38.18.text: can do in the long term.
